Convergent Technology Solutions (CTS) is a growing IT solutions and services provider based in Chennai, India. It specializes in travel, visa automation, e-commerce, healthcare, and financial services domains. CTS offers a range of solutions, including AI/ML-based automation, RPA, SaaS products, and production support services. With a strong presence in GCC countries and partnerships like Dnata, CTS delivers innovative solutions and seamless customer experiences.
